name: Gummy Bears
description: Colourful, chewy Gummy Bears bursting with classic fruity flavours, perfect for snacking, parties, and candy buffets.
highlights: Soft, chewy texture with a sweet fruity bite in every bear.
Assorted flavours like cherry, lemon, orange, apple and pineapple.
Approx. 40 gummies per 500 g bag.
Great for movie nights, birthday parties or candy jars.

name: Sour Worms
description: Tangy, chewy sour gummy worms coated in zesty sugar for the perfect sweet‑and‑sour hit.
highlights: Bright dual‑colour worms with a fun wiggly shape.
Bold sour coating balanced with a sweet gummy centre.
Perfect for topping sundaes, cupcakes, or snack bowls.

name: Peach Rings
description: Soft, sugary peach‑flavoured gummy rings with a juicy burst in every bite.
highlights: Classic peach candy flavour with a sweet aroma.
Sugar‑dusted exterior and chewy centre.
Great for sharing, party favour bags, and candy charcuterie boards.

name: Rainbow Sours
description: Colourful sour rainbow belts layered with fruity flavours and a tangy sugar coating.
highlights: Striped belts in bright rainbow colours.
Mix of sweet fruit flavours with a sour kick.
Fun to twist, tear, and share with friends.

name: Milk Chocolate
description: Smooth, creamy milk chocolate that melts in your mouth for a classic sweet treat.
highlights: Rich cocoa flavour with a velvety texture.
Perfect for snacking, baking, or gifting.
Pairs well with coffee, tea, or fresh fruit.

name: M&M's
description: Crunchy candy‑coated milk chocolate pieces in a rainbow of fun colours.
highlights: Colourful shell with a smooth chocolate centre.
Great for trail mix, baking, or snacking by the handful.
Perfect for parties, movie nights, and candy bowls.

name: Chocolate Pretzals
description: Crispy pretzels dipped in rich chocolate for the perfect sweet‑and‑salty combo.
highlights: Satisfying crunch with a smooth chocolate coating.
Balanced sweet and salty flavour profile.
Great for snack boards, gifts, or late‑night cravings.

name: Caramel
description: Soft, buttery caramels that deliver a rich, slow‑melting sweetness.
highlights: Creamy, chewy texture with deep caramel flavour.
Individually sized pieces for easy sharing.
Perfect with apples, ice cream, or on their own.

name: Starburst
description: Juicy, individually wrapped fruit‑chew candies in assorted bold flavours.
highlights: Flavours like strawberry, lemon, orange, and cherry.
Soft, chewy texture with an intense fruity taste.
Great for grab‑and‑go snacking and candy dishes.

name: Skittles
description: Bite‑sized, colourful candies with a crunchy shell and chewy fruit‑flavoured centre.
highlights: Taste‑the‑rainbow mix of classic Skittles flavours.
Crisp shell with a satisfying chewy middle.
Perfect for sharing at parties, games, and movie nights.

name: Jelly Beans
description: Assorted jelly beans packed with playful fruity flavours in every tiny bite.
highlights: Colourful mix of classic and fun flavours.
Chewy texture that candy lovers enjoy one bean at a time.
Ideal for candy jars, Easter baskets, and decorating desserts.

name: Sweat Hearts
description: Pastel candy hearts stamped with sweet messages, perfect for sharing the love.
highlights: Iconic Valentine’s Day candy with fun sayings.
Crunchy texture with light, nostalgic sweetness.
Great for decorating cupcakes, cards, and treat bags.
